price: Kuma yanã tunkuɗe mata azãba ta yi shaida, shaida huɗu da Allah, 'Lalle shĩ haƙĩƙa, yanã daga maƙaryata.'
arabic: وَيَدۡرَؤُاْ عَنۡهَا ٱلۡعَذَابَ أَن تَشۡهَدَ أَرۡبَعَ شَهَٰدَٰتِۭ بِٱللَّهِ إِنَّهُۥ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayadra-u ʿanhā al-ʿadhāba an tashhada arbaʿa shahādātin bil-lahi innahu lamina al-kādhibīna
